channel.title: Projects on Jerry Huang
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jerry Huang

item.title: Walmark
item.description: https://walmark.herokuapp.com Walmark is a user curated, resource wall that can help users organize and bookmark links. Built with Javascript, JQuery, Express, and Postgres.

item.title: Buffering
item.description: https://github.com/jerryhuang3/buffering Fitness tracking application with Chrome extension that degrades user internet experience if fitness goals are not met. Google Oauth integration for account creation and Google Fit API for user’s step count data .üí™ Tech Stack includes React with Semantic UI, Express, and Postgres üëç

item.title: tinyChatr
item.description: https://tinychatr.herokuapp.com Web application built with Node, React, and Webpack that enables users to chat and send images to each other.

item.title: tinyJungle
item.description: https://github.com/jerryhuang3/tinyjungle E-Commerce application using Stripe for payments and built with Ruby on Rails.

item.title: tinyTweeter
item.description: https://tinytweeter.herokuapp.com Single page application Twitter clone built with Node, Express, and MongoDB

item.title: tinyApp
item.description: https://lighthouselabs-tinyapp.herokuapp.com Web application built with Node and Express that allows users to shorten long URLs
